data.text:
فخورون بتلبية الطلب المتزايد على السباق الافتتاحي لموسم الفورمولا 1 بضم رحلة إضافية إلى رحلتينا اليوميتين إلى لندن في 16 و 17 و 21 و 22 مارس. لا يسعنا الانتظار للقياكم في سباق جائزة البحرين الكبرى لطيران الخليج للفورمولا 1 الذي سيقام في 18-20 مارس 2022.

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

لقد عادت باقاتنا الحصرية للفورمولا 1! باقاتنا الخاصة بالشراكة مع tourismbh@  وbah_int_circuit@ تشمل الرحلات الجوية والإقامة وتذاكر السباق لمدة 3 أيام ورسوم التأشيرة ورسوم فحص كوفيد-19 والتنقل من وإلى المطار وحلبة البحرين الدولية.

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

لقد قمنا بشحن 11,407,666 كجم من البضائع في الربع الرابع من عام 2021، حيث بلغ إجمالي شحنات البضائع لهذا العام 36,277,608 كجم! وببداية عام 2022 نقلنا سيارات الفريق الفائز في سباق الخليج 12 ساعة في أبو ظبي لصاحب السمو عيسى بن عبد الله آل خليفة.

data.text:
@JasonMellor1 Hi, Jason Mellor,
Please check Baggage Allowance page on our website for all the baggage details.
https://t.co/n5ZLuv7zxR
Thank You

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

data.text:
فخورون بحصولنا على تصنيف خمس نجوم لسلامة الطيران خلال جائحة كوفيد-19من قبل سكاي تراكس والذي يعد بمثابة شهادة على بروتوكولاتنا المحسنة في المطار وعلى متن رحلاتنا  لمكافحة انتشار فيروس كوفيد-19 مع الحفاظ على حسن الضيافة العربية الذي طالما عرفنا به
#GulfAir #Bahrain
#طيران_الخليج https://t.co/57ONxQtr2T

ابق على اتصال وأنت في الأجواء مع خدمة فالكون للإنترنت على رحلات معينة. لمزيد من المعلومات أو للاطلاع على باقات الاتصال الخاصة بنا، قم بزيارة https://t.co/uNjboHCyJX

#طيران_الخليج #البحرين #تميز_نختص_به https://t.co/jdgskj5s9a

data.text:
@filipino_chino Dear Filipino Chino,
We would like to inform you that if you would like to rebook your flights you may refer to your ticket issuing office in order to do the needful.
or you may contact our World Wide Contact Centre.
https://t.co/FNNWMZVKxQ
Thank You

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

data.text:
@apolalaa مرحبا
نرجوا منك التواصل مع مركز الاتصالات العالمي و تزويدهم برقم الحجز للمساعدة. أرقام التواصل في الصفحة التالية:
https://t.co/IZ90wPxjPE
شكراً

For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities.
